knowledgeGraph.title: Children's Hospital Los Angeles
knowledgeGraph.type: Children's hospital in Los Angeles, California
knowledgeGraph.description: Children's Hospital Los Angeles is a nationally ranked, freestanding acute care children's hospital in the East Hollywood district of Los Angeles, on Sunset Boulevard at the corner of Vermont Avenue.

attributes.Address: 4650 W Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90027
